name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Orlando - International Drive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the hotel is new and it is ok but there are others that arent as much money and just as good. we paid $114.
reviews.title: not worth the extra money

reviews.text: the walls are paper thin, I mean thin! the person next to us was talking and I could hear every word. not just a mumbling sound but clearly every spoken word they said. yikes!
reviews.title: CLEAN, QUIET, PLEASANT!

reviews.text: the beds were new so they were comfy the bath was big and roomy.
reviews.title: Doggy trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I do have to say the breakfast was the BEST we ever had at a hotel. its included in price and it had lots of variety. scrambled eggs, omellettes, hard boiled eggs, warm cinnamon muffins with glaze on top, pastries, 3 kinds of breads, bagels, eng muffins, cereals, sausage, bacon etc etc. no waffle machines but everything else.
reviews.title: Orlando

reviews.text: the location was fine and we couldnt hear outside noise probably because we could hear so much from other rooms.
reviews.title: Disappointed Priority Club Member

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a 7 night break in Orlando at the HI Express international drive. Receptionist was friendly check inn was quick and efficient so was in our room in no time which was great after a 10 hour flight. I had booked a 2 room king suite and was very pleasantly surprised at the size of the suite. It had 2 king bedrooms, a lounge and a separate kitchenette area, each bedroom and lounge had cable tv with flat screen and the bathroom had a shower and a jacuzzi bath so lots of space for us even though only 2 of us.
reviews.title: Great Hotel for the price

reviews.text: Breakfast is included in the price which is general American fare of eggs bacon sausages waffles fruit and cereals a good choice to set you up for the day. It got busy at peek times between 8 to 9 but plenty of seating.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: The free shuttle service was very good to universal and magic kingdom, they had 2 pick up times from the hotel and 2 pick up times on the return, make sure you let the driver know which time you are coming back on so they are waiting for you. The only time we had to have a taxi was at magic kingdom as the park closed after the last pick up and we wanted to see the fireworks and light show which is amazing. The price was 40 dollars back to the hotel.
reviews.title: Worth every penny!

reviews.text: The only think which I thought let the hotel down is that they only had 9 safety deposit boxes for the whole hotel so we had to wait 4 days before we got one and then we had push the receptionist to reserve us one as people checked out as normally first come first served.
reviews.title: Bravo Holiday Inn Express!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other snip pits which may help readers are ...
reviews.title: Great hotel with a bonus shuttle service

reviews.text: Recently spent three nights here in a room on the third floor at the front of the hotel. The back is near the freeway. Our room was quiet except it is very loud with the doors closing on other rooms doors at all hours.
reviews.title: Quiet, Comfortable Property

reviews.text: The linens and bed were comfortable. The location was good for our needs. The breakfast is extensive while being the basic American breakfast. More fresh fruit would have been welcome.
reviews.title: Great Choice

reviews.text: The elevator service was slow and other than those few issues, it is a good hotel.
reviews.title: Excelent choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel was very good, they offer free shuttle service to and from Universal Studios. There is also a trolley that runs up and down International Drive so you can get around easily. My only comment was the hotel's front entrance was quite a distance from the main road and I hoped that you can walk directly from the driveway instead of having to go around this sort of moat they had in the front. Overall, the hotel was clean, well-kept, had spacious rooms with big comfortable beds, and included daily breakfast buffet.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: Its the best Holiday Inn I ever stayed in, its new, they gave me a spacious room, bathroom was great, clean. It located near convention center, and outlets just 2 miles. Definitely will stay there again.
reviews.title: Fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I made my reservation for two king room, with 2 months in advance, for december 2011 to receive my new year in Orlando with others friend ,when we get there to check in they told me they've cancelled my reservation 'cause my card was expired a few days ago but they never call me to let me know that ,the only excuse they gave me was, the booking.com they had to call me ,because I made the reservation through them but then told me we have two rooms but only disabled room one king and two bed room,we had to take them 'cause the time the most hotel was booked, I called booking.com then they said the hotel never let them know the problem,maybe they were over booked that's why they gave me the excuse,NOTE : I wouldn't recommend this hotel to anybody
reviews.title: they lied to me

reviews.text: This hotel is amazing! It has an awesome TV that plays lots of channels including kids channels. The time I stayed, it was too cold to play in the pool and I didn't have the time. Although, it has a good location. It's not too far or not too close (would be noisy) to anything. It's on the busiest street in Orlando so you can buy something to eat 0.2 miles away. When I visit again, I'm definitely staying here!
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel

reviews.text: We stay at Holiday Inn Express almost exclusively when we travel. This one ranks as one of the best. It is in a handy location between Universal & Sea World. It has a free shuttle to both Universal and Disney, however, the pick-up times may not be the most convenient. The cost of a ride to Universal was $10 and to Disney $35-40. The breakfast was awesome with pancakes, eggs, bacon, sausage, rolls, yogurt, fruit and the usual breakfast foods. The rooms were clean and very quiet, surprising since it is next to the interstate. Very comfortable beds, towels and pillows. The pool was just OK, in the back found near the interstate. Overall, if you are needing just a place to stay while you go to play, it is very reasonable in price and very accomodating. The young lady at the front desk was extremely helpful with travel plans to the parks.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: This is a great hotel for the price. It is modern and convenient. The free breakfast is good for a self serve.
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.text: Location is next to the interstate , but didn't hear any spillover traffic inside hotel. It is only a five minute drive to Universal.
reviews.title: Nice place! Handy to all the attractions!

aka: Holiday Inn Express Hotel And Suites Orlando - International Drive
description: The Holiday Inn Express & Suites at International Drive welcomes you to Orlando! Our brand new facilities will provide you with an unforgettable experience while you visit Orlando and the local attractions.The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Orlando at International Drive is your home away from home and we're here to provide you and your family with great accommodations, excellent breakfast and unbelievable service.The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Orlando at International Drive is conveniently located only minutes away from Universal Studios, Sea World, Walt Disney World parks and all major Orlando attractions. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Orlando at International Drive is the place to stay when visiting the Orange County Convention Center, planning a quick getaway to the Florida beaches, tempting lady luck at the Hard Rock Casino, or just simply go for a stroll to enjoy the beauty of Central Florida.Once again the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Orlando at International Drive staff is looking forward to have the opportunity to serve you, take care of your needs and make sure that your visit to Orlando area is a pleasant one where you'll get to enjoy our service and our company. We look forward to seeing you because we are here for you. Welcome to Orlando!
